metadata.Title: CVE-2023-3397 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description: A race condition occurred between the functions lmLogClose and txEnd in JFS, in the Linux Kernel, executed in different threads. This flaw allows a local attacker with normal user privileges to crash the system or leak internal kernel information.

criterions.comment: linux package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
